channel.title: Shaders on encelo.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Shaders on encelo.github.io

item.title: nCine Dev Update 20
item.description: Lately, the development rate of the nCine slowed down a bit. I think it is normal for a project that spans so many years, and developed by a single person, to see some oscillations. This is why this article covers such a long period, a period in which there have been maybe a few new features, but important ones.

item.title: nCine Dev Update 19
item.description: Yet another update coming after a very long time since the previous, apologies for that. Well, at least it comes packed with a lot of enhancements from the last months. 💪
